data.title: Great Bar
data.text: Old fashioned style bar with great oak trims and panelling.   Bartender was friendly and drinks were great.

data.title: Great Dining Experience
data.text: Great place to go if you have not tried it yet. Been here 3 times a week in the last 3 months. Had a Greek Salad with grilled shrimp on it. Was very good. Had a steak salad too. Also very good. The New  York Strip steak was great and came with sides which were also perfect. The service each time by Mike , Doug, Nicole, and Christine was very rewarding. Would definitely go back again.

data.title: Good local bar
data.text: Very friendly local bar with some good specials during the week on both food and drinks. Always enjoy going in here and the staff is always very nice.

data.title: good food and drinks
data.text: Had dinner here a couple of times and the food is good.  The atmosphere is ok.  The prices are reasonable if you want a good meal.

data.title: Great local food
data.text: Great prices, warm and friendly staff. The shrimp entree/appe is the best!  local and convenient. Great burgers and some nightly entertainment.

data.title: Great wings
data.text: Best wings in town. Local joint that is always full of regulars. Nice people. Damn good bar food. Cold beer. Nuff said

data.title: Should have visited sooner.
data.text: Good value overall, with a waitress with a superb  personality on at least three visits. Why travel out of town when Clifton has this homey gem. Good variety in menu and draft beers.

data.title: Ore Ida French Fries!
data.text: I've been here a few times as it is in the neighborhood and always disappointed.  The food is so-so and they serve Ore-Ida French fries!!!  Now I love fries and this is a super No No!  Older crowd..

data.title: Homey Bar/Pub
data.text: Came here to check out some new places in the area.  This is your typical local pub experience with above average bar food.  Would definitely recommend to try out if you're looking for a drink, the good food is a bonus.

data.title: This is my hometwon place. Minutes drive from my home.
data.text: I go there are every once a while. I live few block away from it. Very good food and service. My wife introduce me to that ,( pub) restaurant. They serve a food even late at night.

data.title: Been Around A Long Long Long Time, Memories!
data.text: I remember when the Grande Saloon first opened, back in the 70's!  It was one of our favorite hangouts.  It had the best burger, and the bartenders were old school fantastic. I was impressed to see it has survived the years.  While in town,  decided to drop by for nostalgia and a burger, I was not disappointed.  My significant other got to see a part of my past and enjoyed it as well.  It was a fun stop during our visit to Clifton NJ.

data.title: Eatery and Beer
data.text: Nice local eatery and a place to socialize and have a few beers. The prices for food and beer are in line with the area

data.title: Been going here for 30 years!
data.text:
Typical NJ bar.  Nothing to write home about.  Typical locals for this area.
Thing is, the food is very good here.  Everything I have ever had here has been very good.  I stop in and order food to go several times a month.  Ravioli here is much better than Marios down the street, and I have been going to Marios for 30 years as well.
Stop in for a drink and some food you will be surprised about!

owner_response.author: Michael P, Public Relations Manager at Grande saloon, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review and your 30 years of patronage! We're glad you like the food too.. we try our best to elevate beyond "bar food".
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: GREAT hang out
data.text: Good food, its our favorite place to go for drinks and a good meal.. they also have good music too on the weekends.

owner_response.author: Michael P, Public Relations Manager at Grande saloon, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the review and your business!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Graduation Party
data.text: Had two graduation parties in the private room downstairs. The food was very good and the service terrific. Both occasions were wonderful, next party will be there

owner_response.author: Michael P, Public Relations Manager at Grande saloon, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the review! We're glad you enjoyed our private room downstairs... we appreciate your business!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Local bar and grill
data.text: My husband and I have gone here for hamburgers in the past which are very good.  Last year my girlfriend and I had dinner and we were impressed.

owner_response.author: Michael P, Public Relations Manager at Grande saloon, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for coming in and we appreciate the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Local Bar
data.text: The Grande Saloon is a great local spot with good drinks and food.  Its a nice place to unwind and have a couple drinks with friends.  The food isn't bad either.  The turkey with mashed potatoes is probably my favorite.  They have tv's that always have the games on and the bartenders are typically quite pleasant.

owner_response.author: Michael P, Public Relations Manager at Grande saloon, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for coming in and we appreciate the review! We're glad you enjoyed the turkey and mashed potatoes - both are made fresh, makes all the difference.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Supporting a Local Business
data.text: We live in town so we went for a quick bite to eat and we were pleased with our dinner. The crab cake appetizer was delicious. The steak was good and the pulled pork sandwich and French fries were excellent. Our waitress was friendly and didn't miss a beat.

owner_response.author: Michael P, Public Relations Manager at Grande saloon, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for supporting us and we are glad you enjoyed your visit! Come back any time!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Grand Saloon fun
data.text: Had a girls night out there. The food was delicious and the drinks were spot on. I go back all the time.

owner_response.author: Michael P, Public Relations Manager at Grande saloon, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you, we appreciate your business! We also have ladies specials on Thursdays - http://grandesaloon.com/ladies.html
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Football Season Home !!
data.text:
Food here is very good.! The  service is also very good. I watch Football here during the Season. I often invite friends to join me , and they also like the Grande Saloon!
 It is also a nice place to come with the family! It has been in Clifton for a long time and
has many steady customers!  The Manager is  very attentive to his Customers!
There are  many TVs, and  almost any  Sport Contest can be  seen here in comfort.
 Stephen G.

owner_response.author: Michael P, Public Relations Manager at Grande saloon, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review, we're glad enjoy coming in! It will be football season again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
